name: img-manager
description: Monorepo for img-manager application (client and API)

scripts.build:client: npm run validate:env:client && npm run build --workspace=packages/client
scripts.build:api: npm run validate:env:api && npm run build --workspace=packages/api
scripts.dev: npm run dev:client & npm run dev:api
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:api
